title: Is America Ready for a “No-Lose Lottery”? (Update)
description: Most people don't enjoy the simple, boring act of putting money in a savings account. But we do love to play the lottery. So what if you combine the two, creating a new kind of savings account with a lottery payout?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
